entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
